conclusion: Identify the intersection point of the two graphs as the operating point.
The intersection point occurs at I = 2 A and U = 2 V.
Calculate the output power using P_out = U * I.
Substitute values to find P_out = 4 W.
Determine total power using open-circuit voltage and short-circuit current.
Open-circuit voltage U_0 of the power source is 3 V.
Use maximum power transfer theorem to approximate total power.
Approximate P_total = 6 W using U_0 and I_max.
Exact calculation based on intersection shows P_total = 4 W.
Output power of the power source is 4 W.
Total power of the power source is approximately 6 W or 4 W based on intersection.
